text: Ross Creek is a stream in Benton County in the U.S. state of Missouri. It is a tributary to Cole Camp Creek.Lakeview Heights, MO, 7.5 Minute Topographic Quadrangle, USGS, 1983 The stream headwaters arise at at an elevation of approximately 980 feet and it flows generally west for about 5.5 miles to its confluence with Cole Camp Creek at at an elevation of 690 feet. The stream confluence with Cole Camp Creek is approximately one mile north of the community of Edmonson. Ross Creek has the name of a pioneer settler. ==See also== *List of rivers of Missouri ==References== Category:Rivers of Benton County, Missouri Category:Rivers of Missouri
title: Ross Creek (Missouri)
